label: 阿国
本: The Cambridge History of Japan, Volume 4:  Early Modern Japan . Cambridge University Press . 1991
説明文: [Founder of Kabuki.] Kabuki is conventionally dated in origin to 1603, when...Okuni appeared with her troupe on a stage outside Kitano Shrine to perform dances and skits (p. 749). [歌舞伎]
